example.text: Any bill that would allow Border Patrol to inhumanely detain vulnerable migrant children for up to a month, rip them from their families, and lock them away from the world is not only unacceptable – it’s fundamentally unamerican. I’m voting NO on the Child Deportation Act. [[url]]

Nearly 8 million Americans out of a job, slashed retirement savings, a catastrophic recession – these will be the consequences if America defaults on its debt. I urge my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to put your constituents first and sign the discharge petition. [[url]]

Excellent news! Despite relentless price gouging and corporate greed driving up costs, the Inflation Reduction Act and other strong policies from the Biden-Harris Administration’s policy are delivering vital relief to the American people. [[url]]

Horrified to see North Carolina’s legislature proceed with a 12-week abortion ban – many women don’t even learn they’re pregnant until well past that point. It’s just another disturbing Republican bill attempting to restrict reproductive rights and control women.

America has a Constitutional obligation to pay its bills. Democrats are prepared to work together with Republicans to prevent a devastating default on our debt, but we will never allow our communities to be held hostage by their extreme MAGA priorities.

For millions of families living in underserved communities across the world and in America, the climate crisis isn’t a danger looming on the horizon – its impacts are already here. For their future, securing environmental justice must remain our priority. [[url]]

TUNE IN NOW: Our broken immigration system demands solutions centered in compassion and appreciation for all migrants have contributed to America. Proud to stand behind [[user]]' US Citizenship Act to treat migrants with respect and dignity. [[url]]
